properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY BY M/V POLAR EXPLORER
   TOWING 5.4 MILE LONG CABLE:
   A. 28 JAN ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      00-38.77S 043-36.30W AND 00-38.70S 043-46.77W.
   B. 29 JAN ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      00-44.05S 043-42.38W AND 00-43.51S 042-28.17W.
   C. 30 JAN ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      00-54.93S 042-39.52W AND 00-54.87S 043-34.00W.
   D. 31 JAN ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      01-03.41S 043-27.30W AND 00-13.15S 043-27.38W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 156/12.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 01 FEB.
